summary:
The NWSL is the top professional women's soccer league in the United States, with 14 teams as of 2024. It was started in 2013 after the Women's Professional Soccer (WPS) league ended. The league is based in New York City and is run by the teams themselves.

So far, six teams have won the NWSL Championship (a playoff title), and five teams have won the NWSL Shield (for the best regular-season record). NJ/NY Gotham FC are the current champions, and the Orlando Pride are the recent shield winners.
title: National Women's Soccer League
